backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user account management (register, login, logout, profile CRUD, password reset) with access control checks using a Principal-keyed map for user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping feature IDs and titles to their implementing source files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels for the income tax portal project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-line descriptions of each frontend source file, covering pages, components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme tokens (colors, borders, charts, sidebar) used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Income Tax Login Portal' that mounts the React app at the #root div via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for home, login, register, reset-password, dashboard (auth-guarded), tax calculator, ITR forms, PAN/TAN, refund status, and news updates, all wrapped in PortalLayout.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Authentication guard component that reads/writes a sessionStorage key to track login state and redirects unauthenticated users to /login.
frontend/src/components/CaptchaChallenge: Client-side CAPTCHA component that generates random arithmetic questions, validates the user's numeric answer in real time, and supports forced reset via a prop.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerBanner: Amber banner component displaying a disclaimer that the app is informational only, with a link to the official incometax.gov.in site.
frontend/src/components/NewsTicker.tsx: Horizontally scrolling news ticker component that displays a duplicated list of tax-related announcements with a linked 'News & Updates' label badge.
frontend/src/components/PortalLayout.tsx: Defines the main portal layout component with a responsive navigation bar featuring dropdown menus, a mobile hamburger menu, disclaimer banner, and news ticker. Navigation items include internal routes and external links to the Income Tax e-filing portal.
frontend/src/components/PortalNavigation: Placeholder file that exports nothing, as navigation logic has been moved into PortalLayout.tsx.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for backend operations including fetching the caller's user profile, registering, logging in, logging out, and resetting passwords.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a government-portal color palette (navy, saffron) as CSS custom properties with light and dark mode variants plus utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Authenticated dashboard page that fetches and displays the user's profile, renders quick-action cards for tax services, and provides a logout button that clears the session and redirects to login.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: The main landing page displaying quick service cards (e-Filing, Tax Calculator, ITR Forms, etc.), important tax deadlines, and platform statistics with links to internal routes and external Income Tax portals.
frontend/src/pages/ITRFormsPage.tsx: A page listing all ITR forms (ITR-1 through ITR-7) with applicability details, badges, and download links pointing to the official Income Tax portal.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: A login page with user ID/password fields, CAPTCHA validation, password hashing, and session management that redirects to the dashboard on successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/NewsUpdatesPage.tsx: A news and updates page displaying a list of CBDT circulars, budget announcements, advisories, and deadlines with dates, categories, badges, and links to the official portal.
frontend/src/pages/PANTANServicesPage.ts: A page listing PAN and TAN services (apply, correct, link Aadhaar, verify, status check, instant e-PAN) with descriptions, badges, and external links to NSDL/UTIITSL and the Income Tax portal.
frontend/src/pages/RefundStatusPage.tsx: Displays an informational page about income tax refund status, including CTA buttons linking to NSDL and e-Filing portals, a step-by-step guide, and common reasons for refund delays.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Renders a user registration form with fields for name, PAN, date of birth, user ID, password, and contact info, with client-side validation and submission via a register mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/ResetPasswordPage.tsx: Implements a multi-step password reset flow (verify identity, set new password, success) using user ID and date of birth for verification, with form validation and a reset mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/TaxCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides an interactive income tax calculator UI with tabs for old and new tax regimes, displaying a detailed breakdown card including slab-wise tax, rebates, surcharge, and cess.
frontend/src/utils/taxCalculations.ts: Contains pure utility functions and types for computing Indian income tax under both old and new regimes for FY 2024-25, including slab-wise tax, Section 87A rebate, surcharge, and cess calculations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/src/utils/validators.ts: Validation functions for Indian-specific form fields (PAN, mobile, DOB) plus general fields (email, password, userId), and a SHA-256 client-side password hashing utility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based colors (navy, saffron, portal-bg), government-portal typography/font families, and accordion keyframe animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing a replica of India's Income Tax portal (incometax.gov.in) with its existing features, architectural notes (no backend auth, redirects to official portal), known issues, and required image assets.
